description: AscendEX cryptocurrency exchange offers favorable conditions for spot, margin, and futures trading. There are lots of crypto-to-crypto pairs, significant leverage, and low fees. The platform is convenient for beginners and experienced traders. Investors have at their disposal four services for passive earnings.
name: AscendEX
